translation.en: If you're watching this, then I'm not around anymore.
translation.it: Se stai guardando questo, non ci sono più.

translation.en: I couldn't say any of this to your face. It's too embarrassing.
translation.it: Non potevo dirti queste cose di persona. È troppo imbarazzante.

translation.en: For you, not for me, obviously.
translation.it: Per te, non per me, ovviamente.

translation.en: You're never very good at hearing how lovely you are.
translation.it: Non vuoi che ti dicano che sei adorabile.

translation.en: So I thought I'd leave you a little guide to life without me.
translation.it: Perciò ti lascio una guida alla vita senza di me.

translation.en: You've gotta turn the alarm off in the morning, yeah?
If you open the door, it'll set it off,
translation.it: Se apri la porta, si attiva

translation.en: then the alarm company think we're getting broken into.
translation.it: e allerta la società di sorveglianza.

translation.en: If you do set it off, you've gotta ring 'em.
translation.it: Se lo fai scattare, devi chiamarli.

translation.en: The number's in your phone under "alarm." The alarm code is 8645.
translation.it: Il numero è nel telefono. Il codice è otto, sei, quattro, cinque.

translation.en: And... put it on "perimeter," otherwise the dog will set it off.
translation.it: Mettilo su "perimetro", se no il cane lo fa scattare.
E dai da mangiare al cane, ok?

translation.en: First thing in the morning and when you get in from work.
translation.it: La mattina e quando rientri dal lavoro.

translation.en: Gotta put the bins out Tuesday evenings.
translation.it: Il martedì sera metti fuori i bidoni.

translation.en: Black bin is household waste, green bin is recy--
translation.it: Bidone nero per i rifiuti domestici, verde per la differ...

translation.en: ♪ And I know it's gonna be ♪
-I'll get you some real food later. -[whines]
translation.it: Poi ti compro il cibo vero.
Il curry è per me, allora.

translation.en: Okay. Do you have a name?
No, I mean, who are you meant to meet here?
Your dog should be on a lead.
Can't you read? The park's for everyone.
translation.it: Non sa leggere? Il parco è di tutti.

translation.en: What?! He is not a fat, hairy, nosy cocksucker.
translation.it: Cosa? Non è un ciccione, peloso, ficcanaso, testa di cazzo.

translation.en: Well, you're here, so it saves me a trip.
-I don't wanna walk with it, do I? -Why not?
translation.it: - Non voglio portarmela in giro. - Perché?

translation.en: Yeah, I was transferred-- No, I don't care.
Presumably in your old round, you put things through the door, didn't you?
translation.it: Ma dov'eri prima infilavi la posta nelle porte, no?

translation.en: Mate, there's no need to get lairy.
-Why are you talking to me like this? -You gonna report me?
translation.it: Perché mi parli così? - Vuoi fare rapporto? - Sì.
- Vuoi fare rapporto? - Sì. Come ti chiami?

translation.en: And if I was, you'd be safe, you tubby little ginger cunt.
translation.it: Se lo fossi, non ti toccherei, carotina del cazzo.

translation.en: Great to have you. I remember my first day, and it is exciting, isn't it?
translation.it: È un piacere averti qui. Il primo giorno è sempre emozionante.

translation.en: Very dynamic, lots of people in and out all the time.
translation.it: Molto dinamico, tanta gente che va e viene.

translation.en: It's very rewarding as well. You get to go out into the community.
translation.it: Dà soddisfazioni. Si interagisce con la comunità.

translation.en: And that can be anything from local stories, you know,
translation.it: E può voler dire di tutto, da storie locali...

translation.en: Be nice to her, and she might take you to the opening of a new restaurant, give you a free meal. [laughs]
translation.it: Se le piaci, potrebbe portarti all'inaugurazione di un ristorante.

translation.en: so if you're interested in that...
Everyone chips in on everything, really.
So what kind of thing are you interested in, would you say?
Lots of features. Sky's the limit.
translation.it: Tanti speciali. Non ci sono limiti.

translation.en: Very smart, very experienced, good guy. Um...
He's not himself at the minute, to be honest.
translation.it: Al momento, non è in sé, in realtà.

translation.en: He's had a bit of bad news. Um...
Um, he was married to my sister, Lisa,
translation.it: Era sposato con mia sorella, Lisa...

translation.en: I should warn you, he might...
say a few things that are a bit...
at times, so, you know, don't take it personally.
I mean, you will be working closely with him.
translation.it: Lavorerai a stretto contatto con lui.

translation.en: I've honestly nothing to compare it to anymore.
But I guess a good day is when I don't go around
translation.it: Ma è una buona giornata se non vado in giro

translation.en: wanting to shoot random strangers in the face
translation.it: pensando di voler sparare a qualcuno

translation.en: and then turn the gun on myself.
translation.it: e poi puntare la pistola su di me.

translation.en: -Why are you telling me that? -I didn't say his name.
translation.it: Perché me lo dici? Non ho detto chi è.

translation.en: No, I know, but... how does that help me?
I guess to let you know you're not the only one.
translation.it: È per dirti che non sei l'unico.

translation.en: Well, the only mental case out there.
the only guy with mental problems.
[scoffs] God, man, where do I start?
Maybe start with me, as I'm paying, but...
translation.it: Magari da me, visto che pago, ma...

translation.en: Terrible, isn't it? Scarred for life.
translation.it: È terribile, vero? Traumatizzata per la vita.

translation.en: If she lives to 100, she's only been scarred for seven percent of her life.
translation.it: Se arriva a 100, sarà traumatizzata il sette per cento della vita.

translation.en: You're joking, aren't you? I wasn't, but go on. What have you got?
translation.it: - Scherzi, vero? - No, ma dimmi, cos'hai?

translation.en: No, I mean, why would you think I was joking about you being boring?
translation.it: No, perché pensi che scherzi, se dico che sei noiosa?

translation.en: Have you got a... counterargument or...
-Why do you let him get away with this? -I don't. [stuttering]
translation.it: - Perché glielo permetti? - Non lo faccio.

translation.en: Tony, come on. What's going on?
Er, we're putting out a free local newspaper
translation.it: A nessuno importa del nostro giornale gratis.

translation.en: -that no one cares about. -No, that's... That's not true.
translation.it: A nessuno importa del nostro giornale gratis. No, non è vero.

translation.en: And that's not what... Can you come in my office?
A lot of people rely on our paper. Not everyone's on Twitter, are they?
translation.it: Lo legge tanta gente. Non sono tutti su Twitter.

translation.en: What do you want me to say?
That I'm sorry, and I'll buck my ideas up? 'Cause I won't. 'Cause there's no point.
translation.it: Scusa, mi do una regolata? Non lo farò. Non serve.

translation.en: Look, Tony, I know that you've had issues,
translation.it: Tony, so che hai dei problemi

translation.en: -okay, since you lost Lisa. -Do you reckon...
translation.it: - da quando hai perso Lisa. - Pensi...

translation.en: my wife dying affected me a bit?
Of course, and, you know, I get that. I even told Sandy about it.
translation.it: Sì, e sai che capisco. L'ho detto anche a Sandy.

translation.en: The new girl. I didn't want her thinking this place was a madhouse.
translation.it: La nuova ragazza. Non deve pensare che sia un manicomio.

translation.en: Look, I just need a bit of professionalism around here, okay, Tony.
translation.it: Ho bisogno di un po' di professionalità.

translation.en: I shouldn't have to explain this to you.
You can't just go around being rude to people.
You can, though. That's the beauty of it.
translation.it: Sì, invece. È questo il bello.

translation.en: There's no advantage to being nice and thoughtful
translation.it: Non serve essere gentili e premurosi

translation.en: Let's see. If you carry on like this, I might have to let you go.
translation.it: Ma se continui così, dovrò licenziarti.

translation.en: You won't, that's what I'm saying, 'cause you're a nice bloke.
translation.it: È quello che voglio dire. Tu sei buono.

translation.en: So I'll take advantage of you, like everyone else does here.
translation.it: Perciò ne approfitterò, come fanno gli altri qui.
Mi dai un avvertimento, io ti ignoro.

translation.en: You'll give me another warning. I'll ignore it.
translation.it: Lo fai di nuovo, io ti ignoro.

translation.en: I'll carry on doing what the fuck I want.
Eventually, you'll give up, and I'll win.
translation.it: Alla fine lascerai perdere e io vincerò.

translation.en: The girls here have discovered that you won't even question "women's problems."
translation.it: Le ragazze hanno capito che non discuti le questioni femminili.

translation.en: Kath's had three periods this month.
translation.it: Kath ha avuto tre cicli, questo mese.

translation.en: She likes Fridays off. You do nothing.
translation.it: Il venerdì sta a casa. Tu non fai niente.

translation.en: She gets away with it 'cause she's an arsehole.
translation.it: La fa franca perché è una stronza.

translation.en: So, I thought, right, let's have a bit of that.
Why would you wanna do that?
Why wouldn't you just rather get better and be happy?
translation.it: Non vuoi stare meglio ed essere felice?

translation.en: There's only one thing that'd make me better and happy,
translation.it: Solo una cosa mi farebbe star meglio.

translation.en: and that's Lisa being around, and that can't happen.
translation.it: Stare con Lisa, e non può succedere.

translation.en: So that's why I nearly killed myself straight away.
translation.it: Per questo mi sono quasi ucciso.

translation.en: Right, okay, but you didn't kill yourself, did you?
translation.it: Ok, ma non l'hai fatto, no?

translation.en: So, clearly, you know, something made you stop.
The look on the dog's face.
She was hungry, so I thought I'd better feed her.
translation.it: Aveva fame e le ho dato da mangiare.

translation.en: It gave me time to think, "I should be dead now."
and I do and say what the fuck I want
translation.it: faccio e dico quello che voglio,

translation.en: for as long as I want,
and then when it all gets too much,
translation.it: e quando non ce la faccio più,

translation.en: That's the worst superhero I've ever heard of.
translation.it: È il supereroe peggiore del mondo.

translation.en: That's the way it is now.
My job now is to make you happy before you kill yourself?
translation.it: Perciò devo compiacerti fino a quando ti suiciderai?

translation.en: That's like a constant ticking clock for me now, is it?
translation.it: È come una bomba a orologeria.

translation.en: Anyway, that's the way it is.
[Braden] Okay, well, I'm glad we had this chat.
So this is... This is Sandy.
She's just started today. It's her first day, um, so, Tony,
translation.it: Ha iniziato oggi. È il suo primo giorno. Tony, lei farà capo a te.

translation.en: she's gonna be working under you. If you could...
translation.it: Tony, lei farà capo a te. Spiegale i trucchi del mestiere, come stanno le cose.

translation.en: show her the ropes, tell her what's what.
translation.it: Spiegale i trucchi del mestiere, come stanno le cose.
la razza umana è una piaga.

translation.en: We're a disgusting, narcissistic, selfish parasite,
translation.it: Siamo dei parassiti schifosi, narcisisti, egoisti,

translation.en: and the world would be a better place without us.
translation.it: e il mondo sarebbe migliore senza di noi.

translation.en: It should be everyone's moral duty to kill themselves.
translation.it: Il suicidio è un dovere morale.

translation.en: I could do it now. Quite happily just go upstairs,
translation.it: Posso farlo ora, con piacere, vado su,

translation.en: and make sure I landed on some cunt from Accounts.
translation.it: e atterro su un cazzone della contabilità.

translation.en: That the sort of thing... you meant?
Um, Lenny, can you show Sandy the ropes?
translation.it: Lenny, puoi dire a Sandy come lavoriamo?

translation.en: [Braden] Gotta get the papers out. Thank you.
-[Tony] You showing her the ropes? -[Lenny] Big-time.
Can I guess the bullet points?
Get in. Eat in front of the computer.
Go to the pub. Eat in front of the quiz machine.
translation.it: Vai al pub, mangi davanti alla macchinetta dei quiz.

translation.en: Go home. Eat in front of the telly.
translation.it: Vai a casa, mangi davanti alla tele.

translation.en: Go to bed. I assume you eat in bed?
translation.it: Vai a letto, e mangi anche a letto?

translation.en: I have emergency snacks nearby, yeah.
translation.it: O tengo degli snack di emergenza.

translation.en: Want me to bring you more doughnuts, fat boy?
Do you mind him talking to you like that?
translation.it: Non ti dà fastidio che ti parli così?

translation.en: You don't take any shit off him, all right?
translation.it: Tu non farti maltrattare da lui, ok?

translation.en: I don't, 'cause I'm not weak like him.
translation.it: Io non lo faccio, non sono debole come lui.

translation.en: [Braden] Um, we've had a couple of calls from people
saying that their building didn't get any papers delivered.
translation.it: dicendo che non ha ricevuto il giornale.

translation.en: [Julian] Ah. Okay, look, that's weird 'cause I definitely delivered them all.
translation.it: Ok, è strano, perché li ho consegnati tutti.

translation.en: You know you've got to ring a buzzer to get into the actual building?
translation.it: Devi suonare un campanello ed entrare nell'edificio.

translation.en: A lot of the old people can't get up and down the stairs or go out.
translation.it: Molti anziani non riescono a fare le scale o a uscire.

translation.en: Yeah, I know that, boss. I will be extra careful with these.
translation.it: Sì, lo so, capo. Farò più attenzione con questi.

translation.en: [clears throat] Um, can I get paid now?
You will do a good job, won't you? You can trust me, yeah.
translation.it: - Farai un buon lavoro, vero? - Fidati di me.

translation.en: Just saw you washing in a puddle from a drain,
translation.it: Ti stavi lavando con l'acqua di scarico.

translation.en: and I wondered if it was a special occasion.
Gonna buy drugs with that and dump the papers in the skip?
translation.it: Con quelli compri la droga e butti i giornali nel bidone?

translation.en: Well, I should probably dump them first, then buy the drugs.
translation.it: Dovrei prima buttarli e poi comprare la droga.

translation.en: Let's get you sorted, Ray, eh?
If it was a dog, you'd put it down.
translation.it: Se fosse un cane, verrebbe soppresso.

translation.en: I was sort of being nice, that...
Well, don't you ever feel sorry for them?
We say there's nothing going on inside to make ourselves feel better,
translation.it: Pensiamo che non provino nulla, perché ci fa stare meglio, ma provano qualcosa.

translation.en: but there's definitely something going on.
translation.it: perché ci fa stare meglio, ma provano qualcosa.

translation.en: I'll give you a good seeing to.
translation.it: Ti do io una bella ripassata.

translation.en: And don't get drunk all the time, all right?
'Cause it'll only make you feel worse in the long run.
but I have spoken to loads of 'em over the last few months,
translation.it: ma negli ultimi mesi, ho parlato con molti di loro

translation.en: and they all reckon it's not ideal to be a fat, lazy, self-pitying lump.
translation.it: e non va bene essere un pigrone autocommiserativo.

translation.en: If you put the dishes straight in the dishwasher,
translation.it: Se metti tutto subito nella lavastoviglie,

translation.en: And change the salt every now and then.
translation.it: E mettici il sale ogni tanto.

translation.en: The garage is that massive thing on the side of the house.
translation.it: Il garage è la cosa enorme accanto alla casa.

translation.en: You're always talking about killing yourself.
Also, you should be at work, but you know I'll let that slide.
translation.it: E dovresti essere al lavoro, ma sai che lascerò correre.

translation.en: Come to the pub. Me and Len are going for lunch.
translation.it: Vieni a pranzo con me e Len.

translation.en: -We used to go to the pub all the time. -No!
Someone will make me angry, and that's the day ruined.
translation.it: Mi faranno arrabbiare e mi rovineranno la giornata.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll take that chance, Bruce Banner.
Come on, please. All journalists go to the pub for lunch.
translation.it: Tutti i giornalisti vanno al pub a pranzo.

translation.en: We are journalists. We work for a newspaper.
translation.it: Lo siamo. Lavoriamo per un giornale.

translation.en: Yeah, and that newspaper is used to line cat litter trays by old ladies, once a week.
translation.it: Un giornale che le vecchiette usano per le lettiere dei gatti.

translation.en: And they read it before they do that.
Fuckin' fat cunt eating like a fuckin' slug.
translation.it: Cazzo di ciccione di merda. Mangia come un lumacone del cazzo.

translation.en: -Doing my fuckin' head in. -[Braden] All right.
translation.it: Mi fa uscire di testa, cazzo.

translation.en: Why don't you throw yourself into your work?

translation.it: Non riesco a concentrarmi con quel...

translation.en: Yeah, but why does he have to do all that "mm mmm"?
And do you think that might be you on this occasion?
translation.it: Pensi di essere tu questa volta?

translation.en: As I was saying, why don't you throw yourself into your work?
translation.it: Dicevo, perché non ti butti nel lavoro?

translation.en: It's hard for me to throw myself into my work, when my work
translation.it: È difficile per me farlo, se il mio lavoro

translation.en: is often talking to a plumber on the estate
translation.it: consiste nel parlare a un idraulico delle case popolari

translation.en: who's grown a potato that looks like Lionel Richie.
translation.it: che ha coltivato una patata che sembra Lionel Richie.

translation.en: It did look like him, though.
Actually, this is a good time.
We've got some exciting leads at the moment.
translation.it: Ci sono un sacco di scoop.

translation.en: A woman called us. When she drags her dustbin, it sounds like Chewbacca.
translation.it: C'è un bidone che se lo trascini fa un suono che sembra Chewbecca.

translation.en: Woman on Blagden Road woke up Chinese.
translation.it: Una donna si è risvegliata cinese.

translation.en: Man who got sent the same birthday card five times.
translation.it: Un uomo ha ricevuto cinque biglietti d'auguri uguali.

translation.en: -[Braden] Yeah. -Right, let's get to the bottom of that
[Lenny] I didn't wanna do it in his house.
Go to the doctor. You've got bowel cancer.
translation.it: Vai dal medico. Hai il cancro.
- Salve. - Fermo, il cazzone ha cagato.

translation.en: Yeah. Leave him there for a while.
[man] When I got the first one, I thought, "That's a nice card."
translation.it: La prima volta, ho pensato: "Che bel biglietto".

translation.en: And then I got the second, and I thought, "Oh, that's funny. Two the same!" [laughs]
translation.it: La seconda volta, ho pensato: "Strano, due uguali!"

translation.en: [chuckling] But then when I got the third,
translation.it: Poi ne ho ricevuto un terzo,

translation.en: I thought, "Well, what are the chances of that?"
translation.it: e ho pensato: "Che probabilità ci sono?"

translation.en: I bet that's never happened before.
-[man] Are you taking notes? -Yeah, all in there.
translation.it: - Prende appunti? - Sì, è tutto qui.

translation.en: Is this going to be in next week's newspaper?
Oh, my Denise would be tickled by this.
Anything that happens, I go to tell her.
Nothing's as good if you don't share it.
translation.it: le cose sono più belle, se le condividi.
A volte sono giù di morale,

translation.en: but then life throws you these interesting little things, doesn't it?
translation.it: ma poi la vita ti fa queste sorprese, no?

translation.en: You can't feel sorry for yourself.
Excuse me. Where's the dog food?
translation.it: Scusi, dov'è il cibo per cani?

translation.en: [man] All right, mate. You got any money?
-Why? -I'll fuckin' kill you if you don't.
translation.it: Perché? Perché ti uccido, se non lo fai.

translation.en: Does that usually work, does it?
the threat of death is worse than giving you money,
translation.it: rischiare di morire è peggio che dare soldi a voi,

translation.en: Or they're worried you'll hurt their family or...
translation.it: O pensano alla loro famiglia o...

translation.en: So, I'm not gonna go into it, but I don't care about anything anymore.
translation.it: Non dirò altro, ma non m'importa di niente.

translation.en: I'm not giving you any money.
translation.it: I soldi non ve li do.

translation.en: No, I'm just tired of doing things I don't wanna do,
translation.it: No, sono stanco di fare cose che non voglio fare.

translation.en: and we always have a choice.
And if I've read this right,
or hand over my money peacefully...
[Lisa] It's no one's fault what's happened.
You know how grumpy you get when things don't go your way.
translation.it: Sei scontroso quando le cose non vanno come vuoi tu.

translation.en: But you've got such a good heart.
You're born like it. You can't contrive it. You're just decent.
translation.it: Sei nato così. Non puoi fingere. Sei perbene.

translation.en: I knew it, first time I met you.
translation.it: L'ho capito quando ti ho conosciuto.

translation.en: Hit me like a bolt of lightning.
translation.it: Mi ha colpito come un fulmine.

translation.en: And I've loved you ever since.
translation.it: E ti ho amato da quel momento.

translation.en: [Tony, cackling] You're not a real vicar, I can tell.
translation.it: Non sei una religiosa, si vede.

translation.en: -[Tony] What? -Why'd you do this to me?
[Tony] It's good for you. It gets your heart going.
translation.it: Ti fa bene. Il cuore batte più forte
- e accelera il metabolismo. - No! Tu...
